imdb.plot outline: Kanade was a normal boy if there wouldn't be his little problem. His so called 'Absolute decision'. At any time, Kanade gets different choices. He has to choose every time he gets his 'absolute decisions'. But once on his way back home, he has to decide between a really good choice and probably the apocalypse. Being a sane person, Kanade chooses the good one. Thereupon, a beautiful girl falls from the sky. That girl is supposed to free him from his 'curse'. Follow Kanade facing different missions and decisions in order to free the curse.
imdb.title: My Mental Choices Are Completely Interfering with My School Romantic Comedy
plot: Kanade was a normal boy if there wouldn't be his little problem. His so called 'Absolute decision'. At any time, Kanade gets different choices. He has to choose every time he gets his 'absolute decisions'. But once on his way back home, he has to decide between a really good choice and probably the apocalypse. Being a sane person, Kanade chooses the good one. Thereupon, a beautiful girl falls from the sky. That girl is supposed to free him from his 'curse'. Follow Kanade facing different missions and decisions in order to free the curse.

A teenage boy suffers through a curse that forces him to select one of two or three actions, many of which are weird or perverse. One day, after making a choice that causes a mysterious beautiful girl to fall onto him, he enlists her to complete a series of missions to lift the curse - but if he can do all of them correctly, otherwise he will be stuck with the curse for the rest of his life.::Big J the Gamer
synopsis: The story centers around Kanade Amakusa, a boy cursed with the mental power of "absolute multiple-choice"a multiple-choice quiz will suddenly appear in his mind, and the choice he makes will become his reality. For example, he would have to choose between going nude from the waist up or the waist down in school. While in school, he is given another choice: 1) A beautiful girl will fall before him or 2) he will fall from the rooftop in female clothes. He chooses option 1, and a blonde girl named Chocolat falls before him.
